duties_responsibilities.duty: Design data models and relationships in Power BI for efficient data retrieval and analysis.
Develop complex DAX formulas for calculations, aggregations, and time intelligence within Power BI.
Extract, transform, and load data from various sources into Power BI, optimizing reports for improved performance.
Select appropriate visualizations to represent data effectively and enable users to gain insights quickly.
Implement data security measures within Power BI to ensure data governance and adherence to regulations.
Collaborate with stakeholders and team members to understand requirements, deliver effective solutions, and document processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field (Required)
